channel.description: Recent content in Opinion on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Monsoons bring out the Bollywood in everyone!
item.description: The peculiar smell of first rains of monsoon often makes me reminisce about the era of Raj Kapoor & Nargis romancing under their umbrella while singing pyaar hua ikraar hua!

item.title: Things That Happen When You Meet A Celebrity
item.description: Funny things happen when you meet a celebrity. I speak from experience. Living in Mumbai has its perks, and I’ve found myself exactly where these B-town biggies were a few lucky times.

item.title: My Life Is A Movie: How Bollywood Defines Most Indians
item.description: Over the years I have observed how Indian Cinema has created a universe of its own, an aspirational bubble that every Indian craves to be a part of!

item.title: From Romantic Dramas to Fresh New Genres, How Bollywood has evolved
item.description: We’re not saying Bollywood didn’t have any other genre, we sure did. But somehow the base theme of action, comedy, thriller, or even sci-fi film was always a mushy love story.

item.title: Gender Pay Gap in Bollywood & Why Deepika Padukone Called It Out
item.description: How do we feel about the same industry when they go about with the age-old and unfair practice of the gender pay gap! Well, times have changed and the Bollywood woman of today like to speak their heart out.

item.title: Has Bollywood grown out of 'happy endings'?
item.description: We’re talking about Bollywood going beyond the idea of happy endings. They’re starting to experiment with open-endings and looming curiosity.

item.title: Being A Badass Villain: Boon or Curse in Bollywood?
item.description: No doubt these nasty Villains give us the creeps! But If you give it a thought, the iconic villain-dialogues are more famous than the heroic ones.

item.title: Our obsession for Celebrity Weddings
item.description: What we find hilarious and borderline crazy, is the obsessive reaction that follows a celebrity wedding, and ‘viral’ doesn’t even begin to describe the maniacal internet frenzy about them.
